title: ISic001765. I.Sicily inscription 001765
body:
Facsimile Images

[τύμ]βος Κάσια
[ἐν]θάδε κεῖ-
τε ((christogram))

Apparatus criticus

Text after Orsi 1893, with correction of Ferrua to line 1; Orsi: Βοσκάσια
2: The delta lacks a cross-bar

English translation

Tomb of Kasia, here she lies.

commentary

bibliography

  • Orsi 1893 282 no. 16 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
  • Wessel 1989 309 no. 1717 (and p.331 s.v. 'Κα(σ)σία') https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394
  • Ferrua 1989 14 no. 6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
